name: v3.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* api: remove InteractionResponseFlags in favor of discord.MessageFlags by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/338
* Fix json tag for Guild.MFA + create GuildMemberUpdateEvent.IsPending by @p5nbTgip0r in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/340
* discord: [Add ContainerComponents.Unmarshal](https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/commit/adce55b02d98000cdb9052496400b0a0cd6884e4) and [Add CommandInteractionOptions.Unmarshal](https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/commit/47c06557c2a30fc05fc2f4d839fcfd8f764e4b22) by @diamondburned 

## New Contributors
* @p5nbTgip0r made their first contribution in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/340

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0

name: v3.0.0
body:
First v3 stable release. API is now stabilized, and breaking changes should only be made to reflect Discord's changes.

## What's Changed
* Gateway: Handling of 'Sharding Required', Proper Closures and General Cleanup by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/190
* gateway: fix Joined field in GuildCreateEvent by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/193
* discord: Add certified moderator user flag by @chanbakjsd2 in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/196
* discord: Helper methods & doc fixes by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/197
* State: Fix data race between ready and guild create handler by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/203
* API: Update the Client.CreateChannel docs to mention the recent permission change by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/205
* API/Discord: Add RTCRegionID and VoiceQuality by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/206
* API/Rate,API: Add rate.AcquireOptions by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/209
* Discord: Fix faulty marshal of Channel.RTCRegionID by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/210
* Fix incorrect refactor which caused the word 'GuildID' in docs and strings to replaced with 'GuildIDs' by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/211
* *: Migrated Go Modules to v3 by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/214
* v3: Add paginating State.Messages by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/213
* v3: Rename all error types with an 'Err' prefix to use a 'Error' suffix instead by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/215
* bot: remove deprecated Subcommand.SanitizeMessage by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/216
* discord: rename ActivityTimestamp to ActivityTimestamps by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/217
* Add IsPending to Member & Fix SupplementalMember json variable name by @germanoeich in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/231
* v3: Update more endpoints to Discord API v9 by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/230
* make OverboundError.Error() a pointer receiver by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/232
* api: remove Client.SendText by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/234
* v3: state: fix slice out of range error in State.Messages by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/235
* api: add search endpoint by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/236
* fix potential deadlock bug by @evieDelta in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/244
* v3: discord: raise embed description limit to 4096 characters by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/243
* discord: add missing webhook fields by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/250
* Update Sticker struct & add missing fields in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/251
* v3: api, gateway: add missing command option types, change InteractionOption.Value to json.Raw by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/254
* api: add missing slash command endpoints by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/252
* gateway+wsutil: Skip unknown events while reconnecting by @hhhapz in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/255
* api/gateway: Implement threads by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/257
* api: make InteractionResponseData.Content, .Embeds, and .Components nullable by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/256
* v3: discord/gateway: add select component type by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/260
* v3: discord: add missing ContentType to Attachment by @Juby210 in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/262
* v3: discord: add omitempty option to Attachment.ContentType in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/263
* v3: fix(api): Client.Command() and Client.GuildCommand() returning arrays by @Sepruko in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/264
* v3: api: Add support for the X-Audit-Log-Reason header by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/259
* v3: api: Pointerize return types for consistency by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/265
* v3: discord, api: add Invitable field for threads in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/268
* v3: discord: add banner & accent_color field to User struct in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/267
* api: Remove Client.Kick and rename .KickWithReason to .Kick by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/269
* v3: api: *Client.ActiveThreads returns ActiveThread struct in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/270
* api: Store embed produced by discord.Embed.Validate in sent embeds by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/271
* Discord: Fix style issues by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/272
* v3: Discord: change type of SelectComponent.MinValues to option.Int by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/273
* *: move Interaction to discord, update CommandCreateData by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/274
* gateway: make IdentifyData's intents field an optional.Uint by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/275
* Gateway: fix typo in GuildEmojisUpdateEvent.Emojis json tag by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/276
* discord, gateway: update some things to match current API docs by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/277
* v3: discord, api, gateway: add per-guild avatars by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/278
* v3: discord: add ChannelType field to CommandOption by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/279
* discord/api: support fetching bot's Application by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/282
* v3: fix(discord): fix json tag for Guild.Features by @Sepruko in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/283
* Gateway: Fix Context overwrite in Gateway.Open by @mavolin in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/285
* discord: Refactor interactions and components by @diamondburned in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/289
* discord: Add Options field to AutocompleteOption by @tadeokondrak in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/290
* discord: use json.Unmarshal instead of Unquote first by @tadeokondrak in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/292
* examples: Add autocomplete example by @tadeokondrak in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/293
* discord: remove invalid Choice types, add helper functions by @samhza in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/295
* v3: Refactor gateway by @diamondburned in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/291
* Fix broken links by @avdb13 in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/298
* v3: discord/api/gateway: add timeouts by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/299
* feat: Find method on options by @Karitham in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/300
* bulkOverwrite now accepts CreateCommand as it should by @Karitham in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/301
* state: fix updating reaction count in reaction remove event by @Juby210 in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/302
* v3: voice: udp.Manager for seamless reconnection by @diamondburned in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/241
* v3: gateway: update CommunicationDisabledUntil in GuildMemberUpdateEvent.UpdateMember by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/307
* Modal interaction support by @itslychee in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/310
* Add Autocomplete flags to Number and Integer options by @tystuyfzand in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/311
* Add Type to CommandInteractionOption by @tystuyfzand in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/312
* discord: Add Icon/Emoji & Tags to Role by @Vendicated in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/313
* gateway: remove 4003 from fatal close codes by @starshine-sys in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/316
* gateway: Added the struct field of the Thread Members Update event. by @Neoration in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/317
* Support guild scheduled events by @itslychee in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/319
* discord: Add localization to Application Commands by @diamondburned in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/322
* api: Add localization fields to Application Command creation data by @Neoration in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/323
* api/discord: add DefaultMemberPermissions and NoDMPermission to commands by @Juby210 in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/326
* discord: Add MessageInteraction & field for Message by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/328
* Autocomplete Options changes by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/329
* discord: Add GuildID and TargetID to CommandInteraction by @Vendicated in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/330
* Add AttachmentOption type by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/331
* Fix comment spacing by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/332
* Fix TextInputComponent JSON fields by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/334
* Name Member guild ID params appropriately by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/335
* Add Invite.URL() methods by @twoscott in https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/pull/336

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa/compare/v2.0.6...v3.0.0

name: v3.0.0-rc.6
body: Minor fixes and new API additions.

name: v3.0.0-rc.5
body: Added several new and recent Interaction APIs.

name: v3.0.0-rc.4
body: Merged gateway events refactor.

name: v3.0.0-rc.3
body:
Release candidate 3.

Biggest change includes the slash/interaction commands refactor.

name: v3.0.0-rc.2
body: Bug fixes since `rc1`; deprecation of package `bot`.

name: v2.1.0
body: Several new changes; see `git log`.

name: v2.0.6
body: Minor additions and fixes before v2.1.0.

name: v2.0.5
body:
f5dc90c API: Add File.AttachmentURI for convenience
    3713c9d Bot: Added Run(); updated examples
    3b5a4ed Voice: Add packet correction for RTCP per RFC3350
    a939a26 Bot: Errors to reply as well
    968112f Discord: typed snowflake for Interaction
    65d7b87 Bot: Allow self-mentions; deprecate SanitizeMessage

name: v2.0.4
body:
Bot: Reply with reference to message
API: Added SendReply methods (#187)
Bot: Fixed extra space in top-level comments

name: v2.0.3
body: Broke type `gateway.UpdateStatusData`'s Activities field for a better type.

name: v2.0.2
body: Expose a more graceful method of closing the Gateway using `CloseGracefully`.

name: v2.0.1
body: Fixed a bug where requests exit with an erroneous `context canceled`.

name: v2.0.0
body: Initial v2 release made 1 week after any change in the v2 branch. For changes, refer to the commit history.

name: v1.3.14
body: Added missing GuildCreateEvent handler in State.

name: v1.3.13
body: Added a missing rate limit reset, causing the gateway to stall forever.

name: v1.3.12
body: Added possibly missing Reset cases and more debug logs into wsutil.
Fixed more gateway bugs.

name: v1.3.10
body: Fixed several wsutil race condition bugs and the lack of close guarantees on fail.

name: v1.3.9
body: Fixed data races involving getters in wsutil's Conn implementation.

name: v1.3.8
body: Refactored wsutil to be more thread safe.

name: v1.3.7
body: Fixed various race conditions in the voice gateway and the main gateway.

name: v1.3.6
body: Fixed Messages, MessagesBefore and MessagesAfter (again!).

name: v1.3.5
body: Fixed api.MessagesBefore and api.MessagesAfter fetching incorrectly beyond 100s of messages.

name: v1.3.4
body: Minor State fixes.

name: v1.3.3
body: Fixed empty Query on RequestGuildMembersData broken in package gateway.

name: v1.3.2
body: Fixed Bot out of bound error while parsing commands with trailing backticks.

name: v1.3.1
body: Fix invalid role mention generation.

name: v1.3.0
body: Improved overall internal code for wsutil, which includes removing a redundant global variable that was unused in the first place.

name: v1.2.2
body: ParseSnowflake now uses ParseUint appropriately. GuildFolderID, however, is now a signed int because Discord would sometimes give negative IDs.

name: v1.2.1
body: Made PacemakerLoop valid as zero-value for easier Gateway debugging.

name: v1.2.0
body: Ready events now automatically reset the state cache to prevent staleness.

name: v1.1.7
body: Implement changes to permission, allow and deny fields in the API.

name: v1.1.6
body: Added a custom GuildFolderID type for GuildFolder in Gateway.

name: v1.1.5
body: Fixed GuildFolder.ID unmarshaling in Gateway. This only affects user accounts.

name: v1.1.4
body: Allow dangling quotes if a command has a custom parser as one of its arguments.

name: v1.1.3
body: Fixed unlock of unlocked mutex bug in API/httputil.

name: v1.1.2
body: Added Watching activity in Discord.

name: v1.1.1
body: Better synchronization on Gateway's close methods.

name: v1.1.0
body: Finalizing breaking changes after v1.0.0.

name: v1.0.1
body: Inconsistency improvements; bug fixes that were missed during the v1 PRs.

name: v1.0.0
body: Additional breaking changes to clean up and finalize the overall library's API. Refer to PR #135.

name: v0.12.6
body: Minor faulty API fixes in Gateway; test fixes in Gateway and Handler.

name: v0.12.5
body: Updated the message URL in (*discord.Message).URL() as well as fixed individual message fetching not having GuildID.

name: v0.12.4
body: Added blocking send cleanup to avoid goroutine leak in Handler.

name: v0.12.3
body: Fixed autoreconnect misusing context in the Gateway and Voice Gateway.

name: v0.12.2
body: Fixed wrong usage of Context in Gateway reconnection.

name: v0.12.1
body: Fixed inconsistency in the Handler documentation.

name: v0.12.0
body: Added support for channel event handlers into Handler.

name: v0.11.0
body: Deprecated useless type definitions for embedded structs in the Gateway. This is a breaking change, so it's bumped more. It also includes older tags that also slightly break the API.

name: v0.10.5
body: Allow for more lenient rate limiting in Gateway; added Relationship REST API methods.

name: v0.10.4
body: Help generators now allow generating hidden commands in package Bot.

name: v0.10.3
body: Fixed Ban panicking in API.

name: v0.10.2
body: Added API's SetNote for user accounts.

name: v0.10.1
body: Changed Gateway's Relationship struct for type and name clarification.

name: v0.10.0
body: Slight API changes related to the Gateway. Breaks some minor internal APIs. Refer to commit log.

name: v0.9.6
body: Fixed a panic bug when the gateway fails to connect initially in Session.

name: v0.9.5
body: State now handles MessageCreate and MessageUpdate's missing Member.User field; fixed a bug where PreHandler wasn't being called appropriately; added documentation for State.

name: v0.9.4
body: Fixed bug.

name: v0.9.3
body: Split GuildCreateEvent into multiple other verbose events that might be helpful. Additional minor tweaks and fixes included.

name: v0.9.2
body: Additional API fixes.

name: v0.9.1
body: Additional API fixes.

name: v0.9.0
body: Several API breakage for consistency.

name: v0.8.8
body: Fixed a pagination bug.

name: v0.8.7
body: Fixes additional bugs.

name: v0.8.6
body: Additional changes to reflect Discord's latest. Some API breakage.

name: v0.8.5
body: Fixed Discord not setting GuildID for Ready.Guild.Channels, which would mess up the state otherwise.

name: v0.8.4
body: Several other API fixes, fixed GuildCreateEvent not having Channels.

name: v0.8.3
body: Fixed message out of range bug.

name: v0.8.1
body: Additional API fixes and additions to conform to Discord's.

name: v0.8.0
body: Deprecated the NameFlag API, refer to the new _example/advanced_bot. Also added EditableCommands.

name: v0.7.5
body: Pretty fatal snowflake bug fix.

name: v0.7.4
body: Emoji bug fixes.

name: v0.7.3
body: Null snowflake bug fixes, voice changes, and more.

name: v0.7.2
body: Minor bug fixes from earlier releases.

name: v0.7.1
body: Reversed EditMessage API for backwards compatibility and consistency

name: v0.7.0
body: Several API breakages, mainly revolves around the API package and some structures of the Discord package.

name: v0.6.4
body: Fixed Audit Log structures.

name: v0.6.3
body: Several bug fixes and API additions.

name: v0.6.2
body: EOF bug fix, minor improvements and fixes.

name: v0.6.1
body: Fixed invalid iota for UserFlags.

name: v0.6.0
body: Several breaking `bot` API changes in exchange for some API additions. Refer to commits.

name: v0.5.1
body: Added a root package.

name: v0.5.0
body: Added voice API and integration tests.

name: v0.4.2.0
body: Final release before merging voice.

name: v0.4.1
body: Added voice states.

name: v0.4.0
body: Added an HTTP driver API, allowing for different HTTP client implementations such as fasthttp.

name: v0.3.2
body: Minor internal changes.

name: v0.3.1
body: Fixed bug related to the session being reconnected forever due to an InvalidSession.

name: v0.3.0
body: Deprecated `Wait()`, `Reconnect()` now retries forever, ReconnectOP bug fixes, some minor package Bot changes.

name: v0.2.0
body: Several breaking API changes and dependency changes. Refer to commit log for more information.

name: v0.1.5
body: Trivial API breaks, added more Gateway events, Handler bug fixes, etc.

name: v0.1.3
body: Fixed a bug where gateway fails would panic. Additional minor bug fixes.

name: v0.1.2
body: More gateway bug fixes and schema bug fixes.

name: v0.1.1
body:
### Fixes
- Several race conditions
- State abstract functions

### Improvements
- Better rate limiting
- More tests

(There's probably more)

name: v0.1.0
body: Bumped version v0.0.13.

name: v0.0.13
body: Command parser errors are now better, methods can now return replies and errors instead of only errors.

name: v0.0.12
body:
Bug fixes, new features, and major improvements for the Bot package:
- Package now has a proper shellword parser
- Plumb flag is added
- Methods can now get the original content without the commands, with CustomParser/Content
- Arguments no longer need to be pointers, including custom ones.

name: v0.0.11
body: State cache fixes and improvements, Emoji's APIString fixed, Webhook Update event fixed, Execute Webhook fixed, Bot package bug fixes.

name: v0.0.10
body:
API changes, breaking too.

Might be a candidate for v0.1.0.

name: v0.0.9
body: Minor fixes, changed the API package's reaction API, added a WaitFor helper method for Handler.

name: v0.0.8
body: Reverted Snowflake type changes.

name: v0.0.7
body: Fixed some bugs related to bots, minor tweaks and helper functions.

name: v0.0.6
body: Fixed a bug related to message requests resulting in 400 Bad Request randomly.

name: v0.0.5
body: Fixed race conditions in the gateway that involves reconnection.

name: v0.0.4
body: Minor fixes that fix potential issues and an overly verbose state cache.

name: v0.0.3
body: Fixed bug where message state would screw up, and more minor changes.

name: v0.0.2
body: Minor bug fixes and documentation updates.
